title: Stadion An der Alten Försterei - Wikipedia
snippet: Stadion An der Alten Försterei (German pronunciation: [ˌʃtaːdi̯ɔn ʔan deːɐ̯ ˈʔaltn̩ fœʁstəˈʁaɪ̯] ⓘ; English: Stadium at the old forester's house) is a football stadium in Köpenick and the largest single-purpose football stadium in the German capital of Berlin.

title: 1.FC Union Berlin - Stadium - Stadion An der Alten Försterei | Transfermarkt
snippet: This page provides you with information about the stadium of the selected club. In addition to the basic facts, you can find the address of the stadium, access information, special features, prices in the stadium and name rights.

title: Design: Alte Försterei – StadiumDB.com
snippet: Stadium design: Alte Försterei, Berlin; capacity: 40000; clubs: 1. FC Union Berlin.

title: Union Berlin offers fans shares in An der Alten Försterei stadium facelift | Bundesliga
snippet: One of European football's most instantly recognisable top-flight venues, the An der Alten Försterei Stadium is set to undergo a radical facelift that will see its capacity increased from just over 22,000 to 40,500.

title: Alte Försterei (2025) - All You Need to Know BEFORE You Go (with Reviews)
snippet: the stadium of 1. FC Union Berlin is only ranked 43rd among German football stadiums with a capacity of 22,012 spectators. But maybe that's why the atmosphere at home games is so good.
